channel.title: Client disconnected?
channel.description:
Okay so I download MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan... next i click "start server" and type in a username and password and i get this.... :mad:
[02:34:52]Couldn't open output stream to log file riesrune12-20090623.log [02:34:52] [02:34:52]Logging into (riesrune12, *********) [02:34:52]Your UID is:82115548 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:53828 Did not save for riesrune12 Server: Client/Handler: Client riesrune12 disconnected.
And then above my username it says: "Your account is already logged in. Try again right now, or make another name" :confused: ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ most of the time it says"Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own." after i've already pressed start new server. and it says it couldn't open output stream to log file riesrune12-20090623

item.title: Client disconnected?
item.dc:creator: @riesrune123 riesrune123
item.description:
@riesrune123 wrote:

Okay so I download MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan… next i click “start server” and type in a username and password and i get this… :mad:

[02:34:52]Couldn’t open output stream to log file riesrune12-20090623.log
[02:34:52]
[02:34:52]Logging into (riesrune12, *********)
[02:34:52]Your UID is:82115548
Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:53828
Did not save for riesrune12
Server: Client/Handler: Client riesrune12 disconnected.

And then above my username it says: “Your account is already logged in. Try again right now, or make another name”

most of the time it says"Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click “cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own." after i’ve already pressed start new server.
and it says it couldn’t open output stream to log file riesrune12-20090623

Read full topic
